english.segment1: Healing rain is coming down. It's coming nearer to this old town. Rich and poor, weak and strong. It's bringing mercy, it won't be long
english.segment2: Healing rain is coming down. It's coming closer to the lost and found. Tears of joy, and tears of shame. Are washed forever in Jesus' name
english.segment3: Healing rain, it comes with fire. So let it fall and take us higher. Healing rain, I'm not afraid. To be washed in Heaven's rain
english.segment4: Lift your heads, let us return. To the mercy seat where time began. And in your eyes, I see the pain. Come soak this dry heart with healing rain
english.segment5: And only You, the Son of man. Can take a leper and let him stand. So lift your hands, they can be held. By someone greater, the great I Am
english.segment6: Healing rain, it comes with fire. So let it fall and take us higher. Healing rain, I'm not afraid. To be washed in Heaven's rain
english.segment7: To be washed in Heaven's rain..
english.segment8: Healing rain is falling down. Healing rain is falling down. I'm not afraid. I'm not afraid..
